#summary PIE Function : Random Function

= PIE Function : Random Function=

The random function generates a random number between 0 and 9. You can set variables to random so that the value of the variable is chosen randomly.


== Example ==


<font color = "blue">make</font> variable 

<font color = "blue">set</font> variable <font color = "blue">to</font> <font color = "red">random</font>

So this would choose a random value for “variable” when integrated into a program.
